cont.entity_a: Speakers have survived harsh weather conditions for 8 years with minimal rust.
cont.entity_b: Weather-resistant and durable, maintaining quality despite harsh conditions.

cont.entity_a: Plastic used in speakers is not durable under intense sun, causing melting.

Sound quality is fair for the price but lacks bass. Good sound with no distortion at high volumes when paired with a quality amplifier. Comparable sound quality to more expensive brands but with limited bass.
cont.entity_b: Terrific sound quality, typical of Bose. Good bass and clear sound at both high and low volumes. Some users report issues with bass and sound quality expectations.

cont.entity_a: Easy installation with versatile mounting options.
cont.entity_b: Installation requires connecting to an amplifier with speaker wire. Easy to install with strong performance and durability.
High quality build and impressive sound for outdoor settings.

cont.entity_a: Good value for the price with decent sound quality.
Some units have issues with mounting hardware and speaker wire connections. Some speakers may have defects such as non-functional units or weak connectors.
cont.entity_b: Some issues with warranty coverage for older manufactured units.
Requires more power than most outdoor speakers.
Highly recommended for outdoor use with a good balance of sound.
